name: Pipe Runner (feraswheel)
description:
An endless runner with a twist! where your death creates the path for yourself.

Run along these pressurized pipes, self destruct to create a steam pocket which shoots you up in the air.

Created for the Mini Jam 102.

Controls are quiet simple!

Press SPACE to explode to put a hole in the pipe (be careful as sometimes it may not happen!)

Line up the steam pockets to make the jumps, careful only steam can kill an enemy! so don't land ontop of them!
